comment.author: 61289374@N05
comment._content:
Nice one!, thanks!
I wish there were more golden age images like this one.
Pity the "new" Flickr makes the browsing experience now horrid, slow, glitchy and the search function many times goes blank, to somewhere else entirely, or denies content (yes, I search with SDASM).
Flickr wasn't the best tool around, but now it makes the experience so awful and my (excellent otherwise) computer so glitchy that the thrill used to experience looking at SDASM collections is gone.
Good for you SDASM for make available to us your exciting and awesome collection, too bad the "new" Flickr is taking the fun (AND FUNCTIONALITY!) out of it .

comment.author: 61289374@N05
comment._content: sorry, it should be "(yes, I search WITHIN SDASM)."
